publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2736 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Public Finance and Accountability (Scotland) Act 2000 (Consequential Modifications) Order 2002-That the Audit Committee, in consideration of the draft Public Finance and Accountability (Scotland) Act 2000 (Consequential Modifications) Order 2002, recommends that the order be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock*
